title: Watermelon Crew Team looking for members. Diam+ Pref
body:
HI,

Atm watermelon crew has 2 challengers, 2 diamond players.

We are looking for more friendly, sociable and active members for our team. Pref Diam+ players because we are going to verse high skilled teams.

Leave a message in here or add IGN Dr Watermelon for more info.

Thanks

replies.body: Only one spot left, for someone keen, we have already 3 challengers and 5 diamonds in the team :)

Hey guys, so nice to see OCE's Summoners being ambitious.
If you're ready for a challenge, head over to [veileague.wordpress.com](http://veileague.wordpress.com) for a chance to test your skills and win $300.
User goin4ya happy 2 join can fill any position
